fact.description: The match is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina territory.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina just outside Bosnia & Herzegovina's area.
Own goal! Argentina's Sead Kolasinac has scored at the wrong end to make it 1-0.
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Argentina.
Argentina drive upfield and Angel Di Maria gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bosnia & Herzegovina defender.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Estadio do Maracana.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Bosnia & Herzegovina throw-in in Argentina's half.
Argentina needs to be cautious. Bosnia & Herzegovina have an attacking throw-in.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Free kick Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina's half?
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick in a good position for Bosnia & Herzegovina!
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Miralem Pjanic of Bosnia & Herzegovina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina's half?
Argentina's Sergio Aguero gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bosnia & Herzegovina defender.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Bosnia & Herzegovina a goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a throw-in for Argentina, close to Bosnia & Herzegovina's area.
Throw-in for Argentina close to the penalty box.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Bosnia & Herzegovina to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Free kick Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Important block from the Argentina defence as Senad Lulic fires in a strike for Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Marcos Rojo (Argentina) gets a yellow card.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Bosnia & Herzegovina throw-in in Argentina's half.
Argentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Bosnia & Herzegovina drive forward but Senad Lulic is judged offside.
Argentina are coming forward and Maxi Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Argentina's Javier Mascherano is on target but unsuccessful.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Argentina throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina's half.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Edin Dzeko misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sergio Aguero.
Play is underway once more.
Sergio Aguero returns to the field for Argentina after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Senad Lulic (Bosnia & Herzegovina) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Argentina defenders.
Corner awarded to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Izet Hajrovic gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Muhamed Besic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Argentina a goal kick.
Marcos Rojo for Argentina drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio do Maracana.
Alejandro Sabella is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Gonzalo Higuain replacing Maxi Rodriguez.
Corner awarded to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Fernando Gago is replacing Hugo Campagnaro for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Joel Aguilar Chicas blows against Bosnia & Herzegovina's Senad Lulic for offside.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina territory.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Argentina throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina's half.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Free kick Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Estadio do Maracana.
Bosnia & Herzegovina drive forward and Izet Hajrovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Bosnia & Herzegovina throw-in in Argentina's half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Bosnia & Herzegovina drive forward through Izet Hajrovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Argentina are pushing forward but Sergio Aguero's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Estadio do Maracana.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Bosnia & Herzegovina goal kick.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Argentina's half?
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Sergio Aguero gets his shot on target but fails to score for Argentina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Muhamed Besic breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Argentina a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro Bosnia & Herzegovina's Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Emir Spahic has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Lionel Messi for Argentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Estadio do Maracana.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gonzalo Higuain instrumental with a fine assist.
Safet Susic (Bosnia & Herzegovina) is making a first substitution, with Vedad Ibisevic replacing Mensur Mujdza.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
In Rio de Janeiro Bosnia & Herzegovina attack through Izet Hajrovic. The finish is off target, however.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Free kick Argentina.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Argentina throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina's half.
Safet Susic (Bosnia & Herzegovina) is making a second substitution, with Edin Visca replacing Izet Hajrovic.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Argentina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina make their third substitution with Haris Medunjanin replacing Zvjezdan Misimovic.
Ball goes out of play for a Bosnia & Herzegovina goal kick.
Throw-in Argentina.
Argentina's Sergio Aguero gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Bosnia & Herzegovina a goal kick.
Gonzalo Higuain for Argentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball safe as Bosnia & Herzegovina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Haris Medunjanin (Bosnia & Herzegovina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina close to the penalty box.
Edin Visca for Bosnia & Herzegovina drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
That's a fine assist from Senad Lulic.
In Rio de Janeiro Bosnia & Herzegovina attack through Haris Medunjanin. The finish is off target, however.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Argentina a goal kick.
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) is making a third substitution, with Lucas Biglia replacing Sergio Aguero.
Free kick Argentina.
Argentina push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Lionel Messi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bosnia & Herzegovina defence.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
The second half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lionel Messi of Argentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bosnia & Herzegovina goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Argentina a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
